Trade/Device Name(s): CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit
Submitter Information: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory viral panel multiplex nucleic acid assay
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Applied Biosystems 7500 Fast Dx Real-Time PCR Instrument
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CDC Human Influenza Virus Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel, Influenza B Lineage Genotyping Kit for genotyping human influenza B viruses as B/Victoria or B/Yamagata lineages using real-time RT-PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines the genetic lineage of human influenza B viruses (B/Victoria or B/Yamagata) from viral RNA in upper respiratory tract clinical specimens or viral cultures, to aid epidemiologic surveillance of circulating influenza viruses.
